This allows you to target patients actively searching for services you provide, such as hormone optimization, anti-aging treatments, or weight loss solutions."}},{"@type":"Question","name":"How can Google Ads help my medical practice attract new patients?","acceptedAnswer":{"@type":"Answer","text":"Google Ads increases your medical practice\u2019s visibility by placing it at the top of search results for relevant keywords.
